title: Countries with the most affected people from earthquakes 1900 to 2016
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of affected people (in millions) in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Number of affected people (in millions) 70.9 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Haiti where Country is 3.4.
The highest Country China has 67.5 more Number of affected people (in millions) than the lowest Country Haiti.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of affected people (in millions) in each Country on the y axis.
The Number of affected people (in millions) is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Haiti.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of affected people (in millions) in each Country on the y axis.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of affected people (in millions) for 10 number of Countrys.
The Number of affected people (in millions) is appeared to be the highest at Country China and lowest at Country Haiti.
Country India has the second highest value for Number of affected people (in millions).
The highest Country China has 67.5 more Number of affected people (in millions) than the lowest Country Haiti.
Country China is higher than any other Countrys with value 70.9, followed by India, and Chile. Down to Country Haiti with the lowest value 3.4.
The Country China has 4.89 times more Number of affected people (in millions) than average.
